original: After an unexpected betrayal by their fellow humans, the Maquis were totally exterminated.  Humankind is now a slave race for their new masters…
translation: 在人类同胞出人意料的背叛之后，马基人被彻底消灭。人类现在是新主人的奴隶种族…

original: Agaist all odds, humanity began to push back against its foes, and as they steadily gained ground on all fronts they found something thought lost forever: Hope for the future…
translation: 尽管困难重重，人类开始反击敌人，当他们在各条战线上稳步取得进展时，他们发现一些被认为永远失去的东西：对未来的希望…

original: Locked in an endless battle, the Maquis was forced fall back to handful of fortified bases along the coast.  Without the men or material to rebuild, any humans that remained lost all hope…
translation: 在一场无休止的战斗中，马奎斯人被迫撤退到沿海的几个设防基地。没有重建的人员或材料，任何留下来的人类都失去了所有希望…

original: The steadfastness of individual survivors after the cataclysm impressed the tattered remains of the once glorious union.  Spurred on by small successes, a number of operations to re-secure facilities met with limited success.  Forced to eventually consolidate to large bases, the Old Guard left these facilities in the hands of the few survivors that remained.  As the years passed, little materialized from the hopes of rebuilding civilization…
translation: 一个个灾变幸存者们的坚定不移的精神打动了曾经辉煌联邦的些许残存组织。因数次任务成功所鼓舞而展开的一系列夺回其他设施的行动却成果有限。旧日守护者们最终不得不将有限的资源集中到更大的基地中去，将已夺回的设施交给剩余的少数幸存者管理。年复一年，重建人类文明的希望却始终渺茫……

original:
<color_white>The Coolest Watch You've NEVER SEEN</color>™

This is undoubtedly the coolest looking watch you've ever seen before.  Its like something from a sci-fi TV show or a video game.  Its bands are a rich crimson-red leather on the outside and soft sheepskin on the inside, with a sturdy gold clasp on the end of one band and seven beautifully punctured holes at precise intervals on the other band.  Its body is a uniform  black disk with a nearly invisible compartment in the back for batteries.  Its glass faceplate functions as a button which calls forth the most user-friendly interface you've ever used describing all of its numerous functions all conveyed by an silly animated Magic-8 Ball that's saying <color_light_green>'No internet signal found.  Note: Lambda Protocol is active.  Go Team Zenture!'</color>
translation:
<color_white>你从未见过的最酷手表</color>™

这无疑是你见过的最酷的手表。就像是科幻电视剧或电子游戏里的东西。它的绑带由深红色皮革包裹柔软的羊皮制成，其中一个绑带末端有一个结实的金扣，另一个则精准而均匀地分部者七个漂亮的穿孔。它的主体是一个制式的黑色磁盘，背部一个几乎看不到的隔间内藏着电池。它的玻璃面板具有触屏功能，发出了你曾经使用过的最友好的界面，描述它的所有功能，所有这些功能都是由一个看起来很愚蠢的魔力8号球通过动画传达的，上面写着<color_light_green>“没有找到互联网信号”。注意：Lambda协议处于活跃状态。请联系Zenture团队！</color>
context:
ID: dkz_zenture_industries_premium_zwatch

类型为 TOOL_ARMOR

original: A  bionic implant that is effectively an integrated personal computer built into the left arm.
translation: 一种仿生植入物，实际上是一台集成在左臂上的个人电脑。

original: A  bionic implant that is effectively an integrated personal computer built into the right arm.
translation: 一种仿生植入物，实际上是一台内置于右臂的集成个人电脑。

original: A breathtaking, seven meter tall, metallic creature stands atop three long legs, with many more segmented tentacles emanating from its central chassis and a glowing halo about its head.  This one is far more terrifying though, its claim to fame being some sort of high-intensity energy cannon, capable of rending whatever it touches asunder in an explosive burst of plasma and flame.  Its unique chirping and booming footsteps often heralded trouble to come during the Arrival, and now is no different.
translation: 就像所有的使徒机器人一样，这只令人惊叹的金属怪物靠三条长长的腿支撑着身体，而还有更多分段的触角从中央底盘上伸出，头顶还有一个发光的光环。然而，这个型号比同类要可怕得多，它的成名之举是底盘上安装的某种高能激光炮，能够在等离子爆炸和火焰中撕碎任何接触到的东西。它独特的蜂鸣声和隆隆的脚步声在降临之日时预示着大麻烦的到来，即便时至今日也依旧如此。

original: A colossal eight meter tall, chrome-metallic creature standing atop three long legs connected to a central chassis.  It would be stunningly beautiful with its glowing golden inlays and celestial design, were it not for the evil-looking ray-gun on its tentacle-mounted turrets which survey the landscape with surgical focus.  It drums ominously as it moves and booming foot falls are often the last sound heard before it strikes.
translation: 一台高耸入云、有几层楼高的金属怪物，通过连接在中央底盘的三条带有分段的长腿支撑。如果不是它触手上安装着看起来很邪恶的激光枪，用外科手术的焦点观察风景的话，它身上那些闪闪发光的金色符文和精妙流体设计会使它看上去美丽惊人。它移动发出隆隆的脚步在你耳边萦绕回荡，那往往是在它发起撞击前能听到的最后声音。

original: A dripping creature, a serpentine body with a mass of tentacles attached to a gnashing maw, this thing seems to have found its home among trash and sewage.  It is an ambush predator, preferring to lurk just beneath the cloudy water before something comes close enough to snag with its long tentacles.
translation: 一个湿淋淋的怪物，蛇型的身躯和一团扭动着的触手长在一张咬人的血盆大口上，它似乎在垃圾和污水中找到了自己的家。它是伏击型的捕食者，喜欢潜伏在浑浊的水面下，等待猎物走进足够被它长长触手捕捉到的范围之内。
context:

original: A heavy suit of roughly human-sized plate armor which once belonged the xenoids.  Its terribly damaged from some combination of the combat its seen, the process needed to pry it off its wearer, and some sort of dead man's switch on the elements that actually power the thing and make it easy to wear.  But there isn't anything to stop you from putting it on.  There are very faintly visible alien hieroglyphs scattered across the armor.
translation: 曾经属于异族人的一套大约人大小的厚装甲。它在战斗中受到了严重的破坏，需要把它从佩戴者身上撬开，还有一些死人的开关，这些都是给它提供动力并使它易于佩戴的因素。但是没有什么能阻止你穿上它。盔甲上散布着非常隐约可见的外星象形文字。

original: A huge creature, encased in metal plating and covered in small golden "eyes". Fortunately it doesn't seem very hostile.
translation: 一个巨大的生物，包裹在金属镀层中，表面覆盖着金色的小 "眼睛"。 覆着在它身上的粗壮的机器扩展物使它能够粉碎岩石并高效地推动自己前进。 它的嘴张得很大，露出它的内部，似乎已经被某种呼呼作响的加工设备所部分取代，如果被吞入其中，想必是非常不舒服的体验。 幸运的是，它似乎并没有什么敌意。

This one seems less aggressive than those seen on the front-lines of the since the arrival of the other xenoids. original: A towering mass of blue-purple crystal chunks covered in small, fist-sized holes, from which drips a disgusting, faintly glowing rock slurry - perhaps a nutrient mix for its young.  After all, it seems to subtly pulsate, as if more organic than its mineral appearance would suggest.  The air around it perpetually crackles with palpable energy and menaces with a set of thick, meaty tendrils with razor-like barbs, with something else just as unseemly writhing just beneath the murky surface of the glassy 'rocks'.
translation: 一大块高高耸立的蓝紫色水晶，上面覆盖着拳头大小的小孔，从这些小孔中滴下一种令人作呕的、微微发光的岩石泥浆——也许是它幼崽的营养混合物。毕竟，它似乎在微妙地跳动，似乎比它的矿物外观所显示的更有机。它周围的空气不断地噼啪作响，带有明显的能量和威胁，有一套厚厚的、肉质的卷须和剃刀一样的倒刺，还有一些东西在黑暗的玻璃“岩石”表面下不体面地扭动着。
context:

original: A towering, seven meter tall, metallic creature standing atop three long legs connected to a central chassis.  It would be stunningly beautiful with its glowing golden inlays and celestial design, were it not for the gas that pours from its tentacle-mounted guns that despoils the landscape and makes your skin prickle just looking at its toxic, likely radioactive, glory.  Its hums hauntingly as it moves and booming footsteps often heralded trouble to come since the arrival of the xenoids, now is no different.
translation: 一种高大的、七米高的金属生物，站在与中央底盘相连的三条长腿上。如果不是因为触手上的枪喷出的气体，破坏了景观，让你的皮肤刺痛，仅仅是看着它有毒的，可能是放射性的荣耀，它的金色镶嵌和天体设计将是惊人的美丽。它移动时发出的嗡嗡声和隆隆的脚步声常常预示着麻烦的到来，因为色狼的到来，现在也不例外。

original: All I can say is that when I saw his eyes pulse red and the whole world around me changed.  The aliens with swords now appeared like armoured knights with a golden cross on the shield.  The strangest thing is that I never really paid attention to history in school, but I knew they were Knights Templar coming to kill us.  Just when they seemed like they were about to strike, I must have came to my senses because I was on the floor of the bus dry heaving.
translation: 我能说的就是当我看到他的眼睛红红的，我周围的整个世界都变了。带着剑的外星人现在看起来像盔甲骑士，盾牌上有一个金色的十字架。最奇怪的是，我在学校从来没有真正关注过历史，但我知道他们是圣殿骑士来杀我们的。就在他们似乎要罢工的时候，我一定是清醒过来了，因为我当时在公共汽车的地板上干得喘不过气来。

original: Alonso always knew that we were not alone.  Alonso just wishes the aliens are here to love us and make love to us.
translation: 阿隆索知道我们并不孤单。阿隆索只希望外星人在这里爱我们，和我们做爱。

With a sudden activation, it can project gluts of flame from the hilt, incinerating enemies before it.  Yet despite it's fearsome appearance, has a strangely musical voice, marking it as something more than human.

original:
From the first time you saw the Xenoids, you've been trying to figure out how they're technology works.  You can't wait to take them apart, alive and functional if possible.

Has no direct skill benefit, but allows you to present yourself as a technician to certain NPCs.  Someday someone might even recognize you.
translation:
从你第一次看到Xenoids开始，你就一直在试图弄清楚它们是如何工作的。你迫不及待地想把它们拆开，如果可能的话，它们是活的，功能齐全的。

没有直接的技能优势，但允许你以技术员的身份向某些NPC展示自己。总有一天会有人认出你。

original: I don't recognize you, but I will next time.  My name is Mr. Erikson and I'm in overall ground command around here, by attrition if nothing else.  If you've come all the way up here you must have a reason.  What can we do for each other today?
translation: 我不认识你，但下次我会的。我的名字是埃里克森先生，我是这里的总地面指挥部，如果没有其他的话，就是消耗。如果你大老远来到这里，你一定有原因。我们今天能为彼此做些什么？

original: I have no idea what happened.  I remember having the weirdest dream like I was crawling out of a cave or being born or something, but it must not have been a dream because when I woke up it was like I had moulted my entire skin off. Now I'm some kind of moth mutant just trying to survive zombie and alien attacks.
translation: 我不知道发生了什么。我记得我做了一个最奇怪的梦，比如我从洞穴里爬出来，或者出生了，但那一定不是梦，因为当我醒来时，我感觉自己的整个皮肤都脱掉了。现在我是某种飞蛾变种人，只是想在僵尸和外星人的攻击下生存。

original: I have some more general questions about the Xenoids.

original: I need to be on the look out for a 'hackPRO' update, it helps with work-arounds on electronics that need repair.
translation: 我需要留意“hackPRO”的更新，它有助于解决需要修理的电子设备的问题。

original: I need to check the autodoc for updates, find me the latest MediSoft firmware patch.
translation: 我需要检查autodoc的更新，为我找到最新的MediSoft固件补丁。

original: I need you to find a cat.
translation: 我需要你找只猫。

original: I need you to find me something.
translation: 我需要你帮我找点东西。

original: I need you to go into find me an operations map.  It doesn't matter if you look at it first, I just need some kind of intel for the local area.
translation: 我需要你进去给我找一张行动图。如果你先看一下，没关系，我只是需要一些当地的情报。

original: I never figured the little green men would be real!
translation: 我从没想过那些小绿人是真的！

original: I only know what I've heard on the radio.  Thank god we haven't had them show up here they sound almost scarier than the walking dead.  I've heard that those 'Xenoids' have also have some robotic drones and machines with them but I haven't seen anything yet.  There was some pale looking guy that was pestering me about them, but I think he's working on the old generator now.
translation: 我只知道我在收音机里听到了什么。感谢上帝，我们没有让他们出现在这里，他们听起来比行尸走肉还要可怕。我听说那些“异族人”也有一些机器人无人机和机器，但我还没有看到任何东西。有个面色苍白的家伙一直缠着我，但我想他现在正在修理那台旧发电机。

original: I only know what I've heard on the radio. Thank god we haven't had them show up here they sound almost scarier than the walking dead. I've heard that those 'Xenoids' have also have some robotic drones and machines with them but I haven't seen anything yet. There was a pale looking guy with a mohawk that was pestering me about them, but but I think he's working on the old generator now.
translation: 我只知道我从收音机里听到的东西。感谢上帝他们没有出现在这儿，那些家伙听起来比丧尸更吓人。我听说那些“异种”还带着一些无人机和机器，但我还没看到过那些东西。有个白脸的留莫西干头的家伙缠着我问过他们，我想他这会儿去修旧发电机了。

original: I really like tossing a card up in the air and shooting holes in it before it hits the ground, and its fun to play solitaire between watches.  Could you find me a few packs of playing cards?
translation: 我真的很喜欢把一张牌抛到空中，在它落地之前在上面打洞，在手表之间玩纸牌很有趣。你能给我找几副扑克牌吗？

original: I really miss playing Sorcery Solitaire, it was a magical gathering back in the day.  Could you find me a few packs of Sorcery cards?
translation: 我真的很怀念玩魔法纸牌，那是一个神奇的聚会。你能给我找几包魔法卡吗？

original: I remember seeing a nice voltmeter at the electronics store in the mall before shit hit the fan.  Try there maybe?
translation: 我记得在商场的电子商店看到一个很好的电压表，然后大便就砸到了电扇上。去那里试试吧？

original: I saw a few when I was doing perimeter patrol a few days ago.  They don't seem too different from regular zombies, whatever the fuck that means.  Still have to pulp them to prevent them from reviving.  Who cares what difference there is between the monsters that are trying to kill you?
translation: 几天前我在巡逻的时候看到了一些。他们看起来和普通丧尸没什么区别，不管那是什么意思。还得把它们榨干，防止它们死灰复燃。谁在乎那些想杀你的怪物之间有什么区别？

original: I tried staying at an evacuation shelter outside of town, but there was barely any food and what what was around was those nasty soy bars.  I started scavenging stuff in the forest and sneaking back into town at night to grab more stuff.  Eventually I meetup with some other survivors and I've stuck around with them ever since.
translation: 我试图住在城外的避难所里，但那里几乎没有食物，周围是那些肮脏的大豆酒吧。我开始在森林里捡东西，晚上偷偷溜回城里去抓更多的东西。最终，我和其他一些幸存者见面，从那以后我一直和他们在一起。

original: I use a software package called MathMAX for my ongoing research, but I need a few add-ons to optimize the workflow.  Find me a USB drive that contains an update.
translation: 我正在进行的研究中使用了一个名为MathMAX的软件包，但我需要一些附加组件来优化工作流程。给我找一个包含更新的USB驱动器。

original: I vastly underestimated how much solder I am going to need to fix this thing. I need at least a pound to fix everything that's broken. Do you have that much on you?
translation: 我大大低估了我需要多少焊料来修复这个东西。我至少需要一英镑来修理所有坏掉的东西。你身上有那么多吗？

translation: 我想知道骑士的事。

translation: 我想更多地了解无人机。

original: I want to know more about the types of Xenoids.
translation: 我想知道更多关于类氙的类型。

original: I was wondering if you could install a cybernetic implant…
translation: 我需要你帮我安装生化插件……

original: I will wait, and perhaps someone else will help me.
translation: 我会等待，也许有人会帮助我。

original: I wonder where it all went…
translation: 我想知道这一切都去了哪里…

original: I would like to ask you about the Xenoids.
translation: 我想问你关于氙气的事。

original: I'd like a few packs of Sorcery cards.
translation: 我想要几包魔法卡。

original: I'd like a few packs of playing cards.
translation: 我想要几副扑克牌。

original: I'd like to read some erotic novels.
translation: 我想读一些情色小说。

original: I'd loot libraries and bookstores.
translation: 我会去洗劫一遍图书馆和书店。

original: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep a town in multiple passes.
translation: 我会确保弹药储备并且分几次扫清整个城镇。

original: I'll find him.
translation: 我会找到他的。

original: I'll go let him know that I found you.  Bye.
translation: 我去告诉他我找到你了。再见

original: I'll tell him the next time I see him, I have something else to ask you first.
translation: 我下次见到他时会告诉他，我还有件事要先问你。

original: I'm glad you made it.
translation: 很高兴你挺过来了。

original: I'm working on getting an old truck running, but I need a good six quarts of new motor oil to get it up and running again.  I even have some of the new money for your troubles.
translation: 我正在设法让一辆旧卡车开动，但我需要六夸脱的新机油才能使它重新开动。我甚至有一些新的钱来解决你的麻烦。

original: I've been helping everyone around here, I want to meet the man in charge.
translation: 我一直在帮助这里的每个人，我想见见负责人。

original: I've encountered a few of the 'ranger' and 'enforcer' types, but I usually head in the other direction as soon as I hear them, since they can probably hear me too.  I've seen them more their hands around like they're doing some kind of magic and for all I know it could be magic.  I ain't sticking around to find out.
translation: 我遇到过一些“护林员”和“执法者”类型的人，但我通常一听到他们就朝另一个方向走，因为他们可能也能听到我的声音。我看到他们更多的是把手放在周围，好像他们在施某种魔法，我知道这可能是魔法。我可不想留下来看看。

translation: 我把所有松动的零件都修好了，所有需要更换的电线都换了，但要检查每一条电路，我需要一份“集成电路档案数据库”的硬拷贝，因为我不能再向互联网索要那种东西了。

translation: 我听过关于某种重型装甲部队的传闻，考虑到目前为止我们所面临的情况，我毫不怀疑异族人会有一张王牌。

original: I've seen a few ranger types when doing patrols around the forests.  I've been incredibly lucky so far, last time I almost couldn't stop the bleeding after they fired those darts at me.
translation: 我见过一些护林员在森林里巡逻。到目前为止，我非常幸运，上次他们向我发射飞镖后，我几乎无法止血。

It strides about the streets, spearing intruders to its domain like some sort of horrid spider from beyond the stars.

original: Little more than a moving mound of crystal and meat that occasionally spits up a tide of glowing, rocky gruel from its many cracks and crevices, this crab-like creature trudges to and fro bearing a heavy burden.  From just behind the murky surfaces of its shell, you can almost make out small, moving creatures skittering about in its complex innards.  It seems to stay close to other crystal creatures, pouring the blue-goop it secretes onto them like some sort of caretaker.  When threatened it is capable of producing harrowing screams, no doubt drawing its friends to its aide.
translation: 这个像螃蟹一样的生物背负着沉重的负担，来回跋涉着，只不过是一堆移动着的水晶和肉，偶尔从它的许多裂缝和缝隙里吐出一股炽热的岩石粥。从它的壳的阴暗表面后面，你几乎可以辨认出在它复杂的内脏里蹦蹦跳跳的小动物。它似乎和其他水晶生物保持着密切的联系，像某种看门人一样把它分泌的蓝色粘液倒在它们身上。当受到威胁时，它会发出令人痛心的尖叫声，毫无疑问会把它的朋友们引向它的助手。

original: The Maquis
translation: 游击队

original: The Maquis don't just let any random survivor walk into a heavily armed base and speak to the commander of the local cell, you need to demonstrate that you are really with us.  Try talking to people around and see if anyone needs help or if you're up for a combat mission, I might find someone to talk you out on patrol.
translation: 马奎斯人不会让任何随机的幸存者走进一个全副武装的基地，与当地牢房的指挥官交谈，你需要证明你真的和我们在一起。试着和周围的人交谈，看看是否有人需要帮助，或者如果你正在执行战斗任务，我可能会找到人在巡逻时说服你。

original: The Walker of War is real.
translation: 战争的行者是真实的。

original: The best place would probably be a goverment research lab, but then again things like this seem to end up in the trash all the time.  Just keep your eyes open for a USB drive that displays the content as 'MathMAX'.
translation: 最好的地方可能是政府的研究实验室，但类似的事情似乎总是被扔进垃圾桶。只要睁大眼睛看一个USB驱动器，它会将内容显示为“MathMAX”。

original: The best place would probably be a goverment research lab, but then again things like this seem to end up in the trash all the time.  Just keep your eyes open for a USB drive that displays the content as 'MediSoft'.
translation: 最好的地方可能是政府的研究实验室，但类似的事情似乎总是被扔进垃圾桶。只要睁大眼睛看一个USB驱动器，它会将内容显示为“MediSoft”。

original: The best place would probably be a goverment research lab, but then again things like this seem to end up in the trash all the time.  Just keep your eyes open for a USB drive that displays the content as 'hackPRO'.
translation: 最好的地方可能是政府的研究实验室，但类似的事情似乎总是被扔进垃圾桶。只要睁大眼睛看一个USB驱动器，它会将内容显示为“hackPRO”。

original: The last time I was out on patrol, I saw some weird cats out by a vacant propery, their fur looked like it was shifting colors, like an iridescent beetle.  However, I was wounded and had to return quickly and sadly wasn't able to follow up on the cats, would you investigate and find them for me please?
translation: 上次我出去巡逻时，我看到一些奇怪的猫从一个空荡荡的楼房里出来，它们的皮毛看起来像是在变换颜色，像一只彩虹色的甲虫。然而，我受伤了，不得不很快返回，很遗憾，我无法追踪这些猫，你能帮我调查并找到它们吗？

original: The massive body of a collapsed emissary of flame.  Still very intimidating, perhaps knowing the damage it can cause.  Could be gutted for parts, but you'll probably need specialized alien tools.
translation: 一具倒塌的火焰使者的巨大尸体。仍然很吓人，也许知道它会造成什么伤害。可能会被挖出零件，但你可能需要专门的外星工具。

translation: 下次你出去打捞的时候，我需要你给我找一张这一地区所有军队的作战地图，当外星人第一次到达时，一切都变得疯狂，任何新的信息都会有所帮助。

original: The zombies are bad, but those things really creep me out.  I mean God only knows where the fuck those blue crystals come from.
translation: 丧尸很坏，但那些东西真的让我毛骨悚然。我是说只有上帝知道那些蓝色水晶是从哪里来的。

original: There are probably a lot of cans around in vending machines.
translation: 自动售货机里可能有很多罐头。

original: There have been scattered reports of Xenoid patrols with some kind of fire or gas attack, but very few have lived long enough to provide significant intel.
translation: 有零星的报道称，氙气巡逻队遭到了某种形式的火力或气体袭击，但很少有人能活到足够长的时间来提供重要的情报。

original: There is definitely one at the nearest military base, but its probably in the hidden underground center, but then again you could find an operation map on any random zombie soldier.

original: This is the iconic canadian action figure, Clark the Nark. He comes with a felt prison jumpsuit, a plastic moneybag, a plastic gun and a plastic cell phone. The lackey of the notorious Thieving Stephen, his plot always involved selling out Stephen as soon as it looked like they were going to get caught and escaping. However, he always redems himself in his bosses eyes by breaking him out of prison. The most versitile of the villians, it's sad they didn't include any of his disguises.
translation: 这是标志性的加拿大动作人物，纳克克拉克。他带着一件毡服，一个塑料钱袋，一把塑料枪和一部塑料手机。作为臭名昭著的偷盗者斯蒂芬的走狗，他的阴谋总是在斯蒂芬看起来要被抓住逃跑时就把他卖了。然而，在老板眼里，他总是把自己从监狱里救了出来。维利亚人中最多变的，很遗憾他们没有他的任何伪装。

original: This is the iconic canadian action figure, Thieving Stephan. He comes complete with felt prison garb, a plastic money bag, a plastic set of gold bars and a plastic blood-stained knife. This is a rare find - Stpehan was edited out of the childrens show in the latter years due to backlash that the primary villan(stephan) was quebequois, leading to the creation of the more generic villian Lisa the Catburglar. Oh mon dieu - ne parle que français! Ensuite, elle ne peut pas comprendre le plan!
translation: 这是标志性的加拿大动作人物，偷斯蒂芬。他带着毛毡囚衣，一个塑料钱袋，一套塑料金条和一把沾满鲜血的塑料刀。这是一个罕见的发现-斯特皮汉被编辑出儿童节目在最近几年，由于反弹，主要的恶棍（斯蒂芬）是魁北克乌瓦人，导致更一般的创作维利安丽莎的窃贼。哦，我的天哪，法国巴黎！套间，elle ne peut pas comprendre le plan！

original: This strangely human face mask is like the portrait of a monster from the deepest parts of the uncanny valley.  While there is no visible eye holes on the exterior, on the inner side of the mask there are two crystal clear portholes that unnaturally distort the light coming through.  There is also a vent-like grid on the lower part which allows air to pass.  The various straps on the back can be adjusted which in turn changes the size and shape of the mask itself, twisting the face into new and uniquely monstrous expressions.
translation: 这个奇怪的人类面具就像是来自神秘山谷最深处的怪物的肖像。虽然在面具的外部没有可见的眼孔，但在面具的内侧有两个水晶般透明的舷窗，不自然地扭曲了通过的光线。下部还有一个类似通风口的格栅，可以让空气通过。背面的各种带子可以调整，进而改变面具本身的大小和形状，将脸部扭曲成新的、独特的怪异表情。

original: When I was on the evacuation bus I saw a group of these strange looking soldier types that were armed with swords and shields. I almost thought it was some kind of morbid live action role playing during the riots, until one of them looked directly at me.  I swear its eyes pulsed red, and I started having the worst panic attack I've ever had, it was as if the knight turned into a crusading Templar and I was a refugee outside the walls of Jerusalem.  If I hadn't already had an empty stomach I probably would have lost it.  It still haunts me.
translation: 当时我在疏散巴士上，我看到一群长相奇怪的士兵一样的家伙，他们拿着刀剑和盾牌。我还以为这是暴乱期间某些疯子搞的角色扮演呢，直到其中一个“人”瞪了我一眼。我发誓，它的眼睛闪着红光。然后我经历了这辈子最严重的一次恐慌症发作，就好像骑士变成了十字军东征军，而我是耶路撒冷城墙外的难民。要不是我肚子空空的话，我当时怕是会屎尿横流了。这事儿想起来就吓人。
context:

original:
Whether or not you like it, you've always had a knack for managing people and have some hard-won skill in doing so.  During the cataclysm,the arrival the Xenoids and the ensuing chaos, you helped lead people around you to safety.

Has no direct skill benefit, but allows you to present yourself as a leader to certain NPCs.  Someday someone might even recognize you.
translation:
不管你喜不喜欢，你总是有管理人的本领，而且在这方面有一些来之不易的技巧。在大灾变中，在异族人的到来和随之而来的混乱中，你帮助你周围的人找到了安全的地方。

没有直接的技能优势，但可以让你以领导者的身份出现在某些NPC面前。总有一天会有人认出你。

original:
You were out on a combat patrol against the Xenoids, and scavenge useful supplies in the processes, but you've attracted the attention of the alien invaders in some way, now they're all around and you'll likely have to fight thorough them if you want to escape.  Also the buiiding is on fire.

This mission is Foxtrot Uniform Charlie Kilo.
translation:
你曾在一次针对异族人的战斗巡逻中，并在过程中清理有用的补给，但你在某种程度上吸引了外星入侵者的注意，现在他们到处都是，如果你想逃跑，你可能必须彻底打击他们。而且大楼着火了。

这个任务是狐步制服查理·基洛。

original: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in going out on a quick combat patrol against the Xenoids.  I'll lend you a hand to the best of my ability but will be taking point against the alien invaders, what do you say?

original: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in going out on a quick combat patrol against the some strays.  I'll lend you a hand to the best of my ability but will be taking point against the alien zombies, what do you say?
